title: Controlled access and garage parking, Balconies and walk-in closets
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 29', 'OR Text', '29', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 733 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'We are now offering touchless tours in addition to virtual tours.', 'Schedule your visit to Allez today!', "Let's Go Redmond!", 'Allez! v. French for “Let’s Go!” is a term used to encourage or cheer on cyclists and adventurist alike.', 'It is also a perfect description for the lifestyle you can obtain while living at Allez.', 'Work, play, and live the active Northwest lifestyle—Allez offers location, sport, and style.', 'Located on the Sammamish River in the booming City of Redmond, Allez combines the beauty of the outdoors with the hum of the big city.', 'Modern architectural design, direct access to the famous Burke-Gilman trail and a short walk to downtown shops & restaurants makes Allez a home like no other.', 'Modern Living, Naturally!', 'Great design is in the details and none have been overlooked at Allez.', 'Modern architecture with detail-driven finishes and unique amenities make Allez not just a home but a lifestyle.', 'We’ve made individuality a component of the design.', 'At Allez, choose between one-bedroom, two-bedrooms, lofts and townhomes.', 'Unique details such as garage-door windows open up your space and offer something truly special in apartment living.', 'Features:', 'Two interior finish options to match your personal style, Ample storage, Energy Star rated stainless steel appliances, Unique floor plans that take advantage of available light and views, Hardwood flooring, Ceramic-top ranges, Full size washer and dryer in every unit, High ceilings for a spacious feel, Balconies and walk-in closets, Custom cabinetry with Corian countertops in kitchen and bathrooms, Cable service for high speed internet access, Expansive windows for more natural light, Kitchen islands for extra counter space for gourmet cooking', 'Community Amenities:', "Large gatherings with friends in the Vue Lounge, Host a barbecue on the outdoor commons patio, Get in The Zone where virtual personal fitness trainers Spin and Yoga classes are offered, Gear-up in the Bike Bar where bike storage and repair stations are available, Complimentary Wi-Fi in lounge areas, Controlled access and garage parking, Completely smoke free environment, Enjoy the cool summer nights relaxing by the outdoor fireplace, Guest suite available, Local Art events such as Acts Out Outdoor Theatre, Shop and dine at Redmond Town Center with high-end retailers including REI and Macy's, Instant access to local highways and public transit throughout the region, Explore the trail on the Sammamish River/Burke Gilman Trail with direct access from Allez, Visit Marymoor Park and Lake Sammamish, Allez is a pet friendly community, More intimate get-togethers in The Hideaway game room, Hit the Fit our state-of-the-art workout center", 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 pets per home, $300 non-refundable pet fee', 'Comments: Pet rent: $25/per pet', 'Deposit: $200 refundable pet deposit', 'Maximum weight limit of 65 lbs fully grown', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'MAqkf9kh3H']
